title: Jordan
description: In December 2009 my family took a trip to Jordan with a guide that we met on the Peru trip to hike/camp through the desert for a week to Petra.

photos.description: A lizard on a rock wall.
The sun setting over the Dead Sea. Very cold, very salty. Made my skin feel bad.
A cool double-peaked hill/mountain at sunset.
Desert. Saw a lot of this for several days.
A rock trying to reach the moon.
More desert. There's really a lot of it.
Then Petra kind of out of nowhere. I don't actually have that many pictures of it because there were too many people in most of the shots.
A camel that I'm about to ride.
